item.title: Deploy HUGO static website using docker
item.description: Many tutorials on the web focus on deploying hugo static websites on bare metal or using vps. In my case, I wanted to deploy this blog as a docker container using docker compose, as I do with all the docker services I deploy in my home server. I faced some small problems while figuring out how to make it work, so I decided to document it here, so that in case someone is in the same situation as mine, can hopefully find this useful.
